title: Diwa
content:
Diwa

Diwa is an Arduino lightweight library for Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) applications. It provides a simple and efficient way to integrate AI and ML capabilities into Arduino projects, enabling the developers to build intelligent and data-driven applications with ease.

Diwa provides a set of AI algorithms and functions that lets the developers to implement intelligent behaviors in Arduino projects, while it also incorporates a wide range of ML algorithms and techniques, including classification, regression, clustering, and more. It allows training models on data and use them to make predictions or identify patterns in real-time applications.




Additionally, Diwa includes statistical functions and algorithms, allowing developers to analyze data and extract meaningful insights. With capabilities such as probability distributions, hypothesis testing, and descriptive statistics. Hence, it can make data-driven decisions on Arduino projects.
